  • Class
    Description
    ApproverController
    Handles the approval and rejection of suggestions by Staff-In-Charge of Camp
    CampController
    Manages camps in the system
    CampListController
    Manages camps list viewing in the system
    EditCampException
    The EditCampException class is a custom exception that is thrown when the camp in charge is prevented from modifying camp information or deleting the camp.
    EnquirerController
    Manages enquirer actions for enquiries in the system
    EnquiryController
    Manages enquiries in the system
    EnquiryListController
    Manages enquiry list viewing in the system
    InvalidDateException
    The InvalidDateException class is a custom exception that is thrown when the camp in charge is prevented from modifying camp information due to illegal dates entered that are not in order.
    LoginController
    Manages user login in the system
    PasswordController
    Manages user password handling in the system
    PasswordException
    The PasswordException class is a custom exception that is thrown when password entered does not meet the system requirements It extends the Exception class.
    PointController
    Manages student points in the system
    RegistrationException
    The RegistrationException class is a custom exception that is thrown when user fails to join the camp due to user status and camp status It extends the Exception class.
    ReplierController
    Manages replier actions for enquiries in the system
    ReportController
    Manages output of formatted report to csv
    REPORTFILTER
    sets the required filters for camp report
    StaffCampController
    Manages staff actions for camps in the system
    StudentCampController
    Manages student actions for camps in the system
    SuggesterController
    Manages camp comm suggester actions for camp suggestions in the system
    SuggestionController
    Manages suggestions in the system
    SuggestionListController
    Manages suggestion list viewing for camps in the system
    UserController
    Manages user account and login in the system
    UserType
    domain of user currently in the system
